pages.title: Green Anaconda
pages.text: The green anaconda ($(o)Eunectes murinus$()), also known as giant anaconda, common anaconda, common water boa or sucuri, is a boa species found in South America.$(br2)It is the heaviest and one of the longest known extant snake species.$(br2)Like all boas, it is a non-venomous constrictor.
